Investor_9.name: Elena Ivanova
Investor_9.content: I have shown strong commitment to my investment interests, clearly communicated my expectations, and engaged in detailed monitoring to safeguard my wealth. My previous reputation reflects my reliability and analytical approach, focusing on maximizing returns while ensuring transparent communication.

Trustee_17.name: Fatima Ali
Trustee_17.content: The trustee's performance has raised concerns regarding integrity and fairness due to a significant discrepancy between reported and actual outcomes. This misalignment suggests a lack of transparency and reliability, impacting their trustworthiness and overall reputation negatively.
